14 template <typename K, typename V>
15 class tbicontainable {
16 NAMU_DECL_ME(tbicontainable)
17 template <typename K1, typename V1, typename defaultContainer>
18 friend class tnchain;
19
20 public:
21 #include "iter/biter.hpp"
22
23 public:
24 virtual ~tbicontainable() {}
25
26 // operator:
27 V& operator[](const K& key) { return get(key); }
28 const V& operator[](const K& key) const { return get(key); }
29
30 // len:
31 virtual ncnt len() const = 0;
32
33 // has:
34 virtual nbool has(const K& key) const = 0;
35
36 // get:
37 virtual V& get(const K& key) = 0;
38 const V& get(const K& key) const NAMU_UNCONST_FUNC(get(key))
39 template <typename V1> V1& get(const K& key) { return get(key).template cast<V1>(); }
40 template <typename V1> const V1& get(const K& key) const NAMU_UNCONST_FUNC(get<V1>(key))
41 template <typename V1>
42 V1& get(std::function<nbool(const K&, const V1&)> l) const;
43 V& get(std::function<nbool(const K&, const V&)> l) const;
44
45 narr getAll(const K& key) const;
46 template <typename V1>
47 tnarr<V1, strTactic> getAll(std::function<nbool(const K&, const V1&)> l) const;
48 narr getAll(std::function<nbool(const K&, const V&)> l) const;
49
50 // iter:
51 iter begin() const { return iterate(0); }
52 virtual iter end() const { return iterate(len()); }
53 virtual iter last() const { return iterate(len()-1); }
54 iter iterate(ncnt step) const { return iter(_onMakeIteration(step)); }
55 iter iterate(const K& key) const { return iter(_onMakeIteration(key)); }
56
57 // add:
58 virtual nbool add(const K& key, const V& val) = 0;
59 nbool add(const K& key, const V* val) { return add(key, *val); }
60 ncnt add(const iter& from, const iter& to) {
61 int ret = 0;
62 for(iter e=from; e != to ;++e)
63 if(add(e.getKey(), e.getVal()))
64 ret++;
65 return ret;
66 }
67 ncnt add(const tbicontainable& rhs) { return add(rhs.begin(), rhs.end()); }
68
69 // del:
71 virtual nbool del(const K& it) = 0;
72 virtual nbool del(const iter& at) = 0;
73 virtual nbool del(const iter& from, const iter& end) = 0;
74 nbool del(const tbicontainable& rhs) { return del(rhs.begin(), rhs.end()); }
75
76 // etc:
77 virtual void rel() = 0;
78
79 protected:
80 virtual iteration* _onMakeIteration(ncnt step) const = 0;
81 virtual iteration* _onMakeIteration(const K& key) const = 0;
82 virtual void _getAll(const K& key, narr& tray) const = 0;
83 };
